about_the_game:
In Void Bound, a fast-paced multiplayer game, you and your team of elite demon hunters face never-ending waves of demonic creatures from other dimensions. The goal is to survive each round using unique weapons and abilities from a roster of three characters. Work together with your friends to fend off powerful and terrifying creatures and progress through intense, wave-based rounds. How long can you survive the onslaught?

Features
  • Fluid and fast-paced movement
  • Choose between 3 unique characters and play styles
  • Survive with friends against demonic hordes
  • Intense wave-based survival gameplay
  • Unique weapons and abilities to master
  • Challenging rounds that increase in difficulty
  • Non-stop heart-pounding action

name: Void Bound

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 620
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960

short_description: Experience the heart-pounding action of Void Bound, a fast-paced multiplayer FPS with round-based survival gameplay. Fight off hordes of demonic enemies that grow stronger with each passing wave as you and your friends try to survive.
